00019 /******************************************************************************
00020 DOCBOOK START
00021 
00022 FUNCTION cepConfiguration
00023 PURPOSE store user definable configuration information
00024 
00025 SYNOPSIS START
00026 cepConfiguration::cepConfiguration(string&amp; persistFile);
00027 
00028 SYNOPSIS END
00029 
00030 DESCRIPTION START
00031 This class stores user definable configuration information such as the size
00032 of the main window on startup. It is implemented using <command>trivsql</command>,a trivial SQL implementation from Michael Still (mikal@stillhq.com).
00033 </para>
00034 
00035 <para>
00036 <command>static intialise (const string&amp; filename);</command>
00037 Initilises the configuration at a specific location
00038 <command>filename</command> defines the location of the configuration database. One will be created if there is no database at this location already.
00039 </para>
00040 
00041 <para>
00042 <command>static cepConfiguration&amp; getInstance();</command>
00043 Get a reference to the current configuration.
00044 </para>
00045 
00046 <para>
00047 <command>cepError getValue(const string&amp; valkey, const string&amp; defval, string&amp; outval);</command>
00048 Get a string value from the configuration database. <command>valkey</command> defines the unique keyname for this value, and <command>defval</command> defines the default value to be used if a value isn't found in the database. If the database lacks a value for this key, then the default value is also written into the database for next time.
00049 </para>
00050 
00051 <para>
00052 <command> cepError getValue(const string&amp; valkey, const bool&amp; defval, bool&amp; outval);</command>
00053 The same as the string version of <command>getValue</command>, but with a bool value.
00054 </para>
00055 
00056 <para>
00057 <command>cepError getValue(const string&amp; valkey, const int&amp; defval, int&amp; outval);</command>
00058 The same as the string version of <command>getValue</command>, but with an int value.
00059 </para>
00060 
00061 <para>
00062 <command>cepError setValue(const string&amp; valkey, const string&amp; value);</command>
00063 Set a string value in the configuration database with key <command>valkey</command> to the value <command>value</command>.
00064 </para>
00065 
00066 <para>
00067 <command>cepError setValue(const string&amp; valkey, const int&amp; value);</command>
00068 The same as the string version of <command>setValue</command>, but for an int.
00069 </para>
00070 
00071 <para>
00072 <command>cepError setValue(const string&amp; valkey, const bool&amp; value);</command>
00073 The same as the string version of <command>setValue</command>, but for a bool.
00074 DESCRIPTION END
00075 
00076 DOCBOOK END
00077 ******************************************************************************/
00078
